name: Type Traveler
description:
Each tile sends you back in time 10 seconds. How far back can you go?

Press KEYBOARD KEYS to quickly hit the TILES and propel yourself back in TIME.

You can also TAP/CLICK the tiles (recommended for mobile, and for making the game easier).

Source Code: https://github.com/foolmoron/JumpTheGap

Made in 12ish hours using Godot for Ludum Dare 51.
